name: SalaryDefense
description:
※ stories. ※
With the ball that got rid of monsters, the warriors
I became a permanent member of the kingdom.
But the wicked king found a forest full of fish.
I hid my yearly salary!
The warriors need to stick to 365 days to get paid.
So we can fight monsters as well.
Although my first salary isn't that great,
If you keep it up hard, you'll get a raise.
As a bonus, you can even get a good item from a monster!
Please keep your salary right now !!

※ dungeons [Various pleasant forms of dungeon] ※

Annual salary 365 dungeon!
Wanted dungeon!
- A stone wave! - A stone wave!
- Added new mimic dungeon !!



※ authority [without any authority] ※
I don't need any authority!



※ Indie game developers get good ratings and Google + 1.
※ recommend to friends nearby!
※ Official Cafe : I made sure it's connected right inside the game!
